completions.nl_description: Recolor the edges of the objects from X to R, and the interiors to C.
Recolor the red and cyan objects in the grids, and also make sure the red objects continuously extend where they meet cyan boundaries.
Recolor the left half of every object to color C and the right half to color R
Recolor the objects of size 2 to C and recolor objects of size greater than 2 to R.
Recolor each contiguous block from color X to colors C and R in alternating pattern depending on position in the block.
Recolor all X objects and their neighbors in the same group. The first half to color C and the rest to color R.
Recolor all objects of color X to color C, then recolor all objects of color different than O to color R if they are neighbors of C.
Recolor all objects to colors C and R alternately.
Recolor all enclosed objects to color C. Also, recolor the edges of enclosed objects to color R.
Move the middle part of the objects of color X, and recolor the edges to C and the middle to R
Recolor the objects of color X to a mix of colors C and R, alternatingly in a specific pattern.
Recolor objects to alternate between R and C rows beginning from the top row
Recolor all objects of color X to color C, and all neighboring objects to color R.
Recolor the objects of color X to color R, and recolor their neighbors to color C.
Recolor all 'X' objects to 'C', and all neighboring objects to 'R'.
Recolor each X object to C color, and all neighboring X objects to R color.
Recolor objects of size 5 to color C, and objects of size 3 to color R.
Change the color of objects from X to C. Then change the color of the neighboring cells of these objects to R.
Change parts of objects of color X to color C if the neighboring object is of color R.
Extend all objects of color X to the right, replacing certain X cells with color C, and others with color R.
Recolor objects with size greater than 2 to color C, and the remaining objects to color R.
Recolor all objects of color X to alternating stripes of colors C and R.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this other))
        (filter
            (color_equals (color_of this) X)
        )
        (apply
            (hollow_rectangle C)
            (hollow_rectangle R)
            (hollow_rectangle C)
            (hollow_rectangle R)
        )
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Recolor the border of each object to R and the interior of each object to C.
Recolor the objects next to the X object alternatively to C and R.
completions.code: (do (rule (vars (this other)) (filter (and (neighbor_of this other) (color_equals (color_of other) X))) (apply (update_color C))) (rule (vars (this)) (filter (color_equals (color_of this) X)) (apply (update_color R))))

completions.nl_description: Change the color of every object that is a neighbor to an object of color X to C, and change the color of every object of color X to R.
Recolor the bordering segments of X-colored objects to R, and inner segments to C.
Recolor the objects to color C except the objects in the middle row which are recolored to color R.
Change the colors of objects, such that the largest 'X' objects are colored 'C' and their neighbors directly above or directly below them are colored 'R'.
Change the color of objects with color X in various patterns. Specific parts of these objects change color to R and C, creating new color structures.
Recolor each object of color X to C if it has degree greater than one, otherwise recolor to R.
Recolor objects of color X in alternating patterns of C and R.
Move all objects of color X towards each other and recolor them based on adjacency, with C being the non-corner adjacent and R being the corner adjacent.
Recolor the X objects. Vertices of X are colored C, horizontal and vertical limbs of X are colored R.
Recolor all cells of color X with color C, except those at the borders of the grid, and all their neighbor cells to color R.
Recolor the top and bottom halves of each object separately, with the top half colored C and the bottom half colored R.
Recolor all objects of color X to color C, and if they are neighbors of another object, recolor the connecting part to color R.
Recolor the grid following a C-R pattern for each row containing non-overlapping objects of color X.
Recolor each segment of the symbol 'X' to a checkerboard pattern. The cells at even indices get color C and odd indices get color R.
Recolor the objects partially bound by objects of color X to color C, and the objects neighboring to them to color R.
Recolor the objects next to objects of color X to R, and recolor the rest of the objects to C.
Recolor the central objects of color X to R and the neighboring objects of color X to C.
Move all objects of color X one step right, and then recolor them with alternating colors R and C.
Recolor objects touching the top row or the left border with color C, and recolor the rest with color R.
Recolor all objects of color X to colors C and R in a checkerboard pattern.
Recolor the objects of size 3 with colors C and R alternatively based on their position.
Recolor parts of connected objects with alternating color patterns that include R and C.
Recolor the border of the main figure to color C, then recolor the inner cells of the main figure to alternating colors R and C.
Change the color of the diagonal elements to R, then color the rest of the non-background elements to C
Recolor top left part of objects with color X to color C, and the top right part to color R
Recolor a 2-cell-wide diagonal (comprising the leftmost upper cell and the rightmost lower cell as its ends) of each X object in an alternating pattern with colors C and R.
Recolor the diagonal line around shape X to color R, with areas touching X being color C.
Recolor the X objects. Alternate between recoloring neighbor objects to R and C, respectively.
Recolor all objects to alternate between color C and R based on whether the object is even or odd in size, with C for even and R for odd sizes.
Change all objects with original color X so that their borders are recolored to C and their interiors are recolored to R.
Move all objects of color X one step down, and then recolor them to color C, with neighboring cells recolored to colors R.
Recolor all neighboring pairs of objects, where one is colored X, to different colors C and R based on their original positions.
Recolor the neighboring objects of color X to alternating colors C and R.
Recolor all X objects and their neighbors to R and adjacent neighbors to C
Recolor the objects of color X to R and the neighboring objects to C.
Recolor objects in a zigzag pattern with colors C and R.
Recolor the X objects to C except the ones that are on the edge, and recolor their neighbor objects to R.
Move objects of color X one step toward the object of color R, if they are neighbors of each other and recolor them based on the new position.
Recolor all objects to color R, and then to color C.
Recolor the left and right columns of all X objects to C, and the center column to R.
Shift all objects of color X which are part of a rectangle to different alternating colors, using C and R.
Recolor the objects near the center, alternating between colors C and R.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this other))
        (filter (and (neighbor_of this other) (color_equals (color_of other) X)))
        (apply (update_color C))
    )
    (rule
        (vars (this other))
        (filter (and (neighbor_of this other) (color_equals (color_of other) C)))
        (apply (update_color R))
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Recolor objects of size greater than 2 that are touching the object of color R to color C.
Recolor inner parts of X-shaped objects to R and the rest to C.
Recolor all objects of color X to color C, except the topmost objects which are recolored to R.
Recolor all objects that neighbor the object X to colors R and C alternately.
Recolor objects with color X to color C and recolor their neighbors to color R.
Move the blue objects downwards and then change them to cyan. Move the red objects to the right and change them to red.
Color some occurrences of squares to color C or R.
Recolor parts of objects where the column equals the column of object color X to color C and neighbors to color R
Recolor the objects adjacent to object of color X with color C, and recolor adjacent regions with alternating pattern of R and C.
Recolor the upper two rows of each horizontal 2x2 block to color C and the lower rows of each horizontal 2x2 block to color R.
Recolor objects of color X to color C or R based on their respective positions, while maintaining their connectivity.
Extend the objects of color R and move objects of color X toward the target color C, object of color C always on the right or downward side of another object
Recolor all objects of maximum size. For each object, move every interior cell to down until they hit other cells, and recolor these cells Red step by step.
Recolor the neighbors of the object of color X to color R if their color is the same as X, otherwise to color C.
Recolor the objects of size equal to 3 adjacent to another object with size equal to 6
Change each object with color X and then color all its neighbors with color R.
Recolor all objects to color C if they neighbor an object of color X, then recolor all objects of color X to color R.
Recolor all objects of size 2 to color C and all objects of size 3 to color R.
Recolor parts of size greater than 1 that are neighbors of an object of color X, towards and including the middle, in colors C and R alternatively.
Recolor the inner parts of enclosing objects to color C, and the edges to color R.
Recolor all objects of color X to a pattern where boundaries are recolored to C and the inner part to R.
Recolor the left half of each object with X to C, and the right half of each object with X to R.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this other))
        (filter
            (color_equals (color_of this) X)
        )
        (apply
            (mirror (mirror_axis_of this))
            (rotate_node 180)
            (fill_rectangle C false)
            (rotate_node 180)
            (mirror (mirror_axis_of this))
            (fill_rectangle R false)
        )
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Recolor all objects touching X to color R, and all other parts of the U-shaped objects to color C.
For all objects of color X, recolor the neighboring X objects to color C and the object itself to color R.
Transform all objects of color X into two distinct objects colored R and C. Recolor the parts along the diagonals to R and the remaining parts to C.
Recolor objects of color X. If an object of color X is a neighbor of another object of color X, recolor it to C and otherwise to R.
Recolor all objects to color C if they are neighbors of another object, otherwise recolor them to color R.
Recolor the top-left portion of the grid to R and the remaining X's to C.
Recolor all objects of color X to color C and extend them in the direction of one of their neighboring objects.
Recolor objects of color X to C and their neighboring objects to R.
Change the color of object X to C, and then color the uppermost part of each object to R
Recolor all the objects of color X to color C and recolor their neighbors to color R.
Recolor certain parts of objects with different colors, focusing on parts size 2.
Recolor the left half of objects of color X to C and the right half to R.
